query: Hi, is this an e-commerce chatbot?
@description: Measuring response time for simple queries not relevant to knowledge base
This query tests how the chatbot retrieves simple queries relevant to knowledge base

query: Can you provide me the details of all laptops available, including their brands, models, prices, stock availability, shipping policies for domestic and international orders, and any extended warranty options? Also, Summarize all the promotions currently available, including the Black Friday Sale, Buy One Get One Free offer, and free shipping deals. Also, provide details on how these apply to accessories, electronics, and bulk orders.
@description: This query tests how the chatbot retrieves and combines complex information from various sections in the RAG & golden answers documents
